author: mwomack
msg: Added Thresholdable interface as suggested by Paul Smith with some modifications to the methods signatures to better match similar/existing methods is AppenderSkeleton.

author: psmith
msg: added a New Receiver popup menu highlighting the new Receiver
you can create.  Currently this still doesn't do anything just yet.
Still working on a Receiver configuration dialog, but this menu will
be the entry point to it.

author: psmith
msg: Changes because of TreeModel moving from static factory, to refresh

author: psmith
msg: Moved from static create factory method to a 'refresh' method
so that a new model is not required on each change.
This is mostly to stop the currently selected node from being lost on

author: psmith
msg: Removed the internal Formatter interface and chain as it was
getting hard to manage.  Once the Tree is more stable, will consider
revisting it, but for now the if/else logic isn't too complex.
